about_the_game:
Part of what R:\Block starts out as a Sokoban style, block pushing game that evolves into something that will push your puzzle-solving skills. The other side of the game is a platformer that involves throwing a ball to complete more complex levels as you progress. In the final game, these parts will combine to make a multi-dimensional puzzle/platformer.

There are currently over 100 Sokoban-style levels, a map that let's you pick your path through the levels, and over 10 platformer stages to complete.

short_description: R:\Block is a puzzle game where you push and fuse blocks to solve increasingly difficult levels. It is also a puzzle platformer, that will force you to not only work your brain, but your jumping skills. Within the mysterious and atmospheric space a story unfolds.
